byline.original: By MITCH SMITH and RICHARD PÉREZ-PEÑA

lead_paragraph: After four in Chicago were charged with hate crimes for an assault caught on a Facebook video, advocates for those with disabilities still hold that violence against the group is often underreported.
snippet: After four in Chicago were charged with hate crimes for an assault caught on a Facebook video, advocates for those with disabilities still hold that violence against the group is often underreported....

headline.main: Beating of Disabled Teenager Highlights a Crime That Often Goes Unpunished
headline.print_headline: Beating of Disabled Teenager Highlights a Crime That’s Often Unseen
